1938.「ずいぶんと ウデを上げたじゃねえか！\n <pc>！！:
You've really come a long ways, haven't you,
<pc>?!

1939.「だがな！ シェルナーに選ばれるのは\n このオレ ヒューザさまだぜっ！！:
But guess what?! I'm the one who's gonna be
chosen as the Shellner!!

1941.「ねえ <pc>～～～！\n アーシクが どこに行ったか 知らない～？:
Hey, <pc>～!
Have you seen where Aashik ran off to～?

1944.「我らの友人 <pc>は 幼きころに\n ただひとり 小舟に乗せられ\n このレ:
When our friend <pc> was just a
child, they arrived alone in this village on a
small boat.

1945.「この村で送った日々は <pc>に\n 多くの幸福と そして安息を与えたと\n:
We believe that the days spent in this village
have brought <pc> joy and rest...

1946.「<pc>は 母なる海へと還り\n 新たなる旅立ちを迎える。\n 皆で笑って 送:
<pc> now returns to the Mother Sea to
begin a new journey. Let's send them off with
a smile.

1947.「ううっ <pc>……。\n 私が急に 声をかけたりしたから\n こんなことに…:
Ohh, <pc>...
If I hadn't called out to you so suddenly,
this never would have happened...

1948.「わっわっ ルベカちゃん！\n お願いだから 泣かないで。:
Whoaaaa now, Rubecca sweetie!
Please, don't cry!

1949.「これから シェルナーを決めようかという時に\n なんということを。ヒューザ……:
Just when I was about to decide on the
Shellner, this happens. Hyuza...

1950.「オレは殺す気なんて なかったぜ 村長？\n 剣の修行を してただけだからな。:
I wasn't tryin' to kill <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>, chief.
We were just sparring.

1951.「理由はどうあれ お前は\n <pc>の命を うばったのだ。\n つぐないは し:
Whatever the reason, you cost <pc>
<if_woman>her<else>his<endif> life. There will be consequences.

1954.「……なんということだ。\n <pc>が 生き返った！\n これは 海の神が起こ:
...What a surprise.
<pc> has come back to life!
Is this a miracle from the sea itself?!

1956.「おいおいっ マジかよ！\n あんとき たしかに 手ごたえが……。:
Hold up, seriously?!
But when I checked their pulse, they were
definitely...

1957.「まちがいねえ。生きてやがる。\n まるで 別の魂が 突然\n 身体に 入り込ん:
Sure enough, you're alive.
It's like another soul suddenly entered your
body...

1958.「なんにしても オレは\n 人殺しにならずに 済んだってわけだ。:
Well, seems like I don't have to become a
murderer after all.

1959.「ケガさせちまった借りは\n そのうちに返すぜ <pc>。:
I'll be sure to repay the favor,
<pc>.

1960.「あのくらいで くたばらないように\n もっと きたえとけよ。:
You need more training if a weak li'l hit like
that nearly offed you.

1961.「うぬぬ ヒューザめ。\n <pc>を 殺しかけておいて\n なんという態度だ！:
Grrrrr, Hyuza...
What kind of attitude is that after almost
killing <pc>?!

1962.「お父さん ヒューザを責めないであげて。\n 半分は 私のせいでも あるんだもん:
Dad, please don't blame Hyuza.
It was half my fault, too.

1963.「ルベカちゃんが 気に病むことはないんだよ。\n ほら <pc>は 無事だったん:
Oh, don't you worry about a thing, Rubecca!
Look, <pc>'s safe and sound now.

1964.「まあ なんにせよ 生きていてよかったな。\n シェルナーは予定どおり お前と:
Well, regardless, you're lucky to be alive.
Seems like I'll have to choose between you
and Hyuza for the role of Shellner after all.

1965.「<pc>の 葬式は中止だ！\n みんなも 家に帰った帰った！！:
<pc>'s funeral is cancelled!
Everyone, go home! Go home!!

1966.「あれれっ <pc>！？\n キミの葬式をするって聞いて あわてて\n 買い物か:
Wh-whaー<pc>?!
I rushed back from the store when I heard that
a funeral was being held for you...

1967.「ボクの 聞きまちがいだったんだね。\n ほっとしたよ。キミは 大切な友達だもの:
Seems I misheard.
What a relief! You're a good friend.

1968.「それに もうすぐ ボクの結婚式でしょ？\n そんな時に 葬式なんて\n ほら…:
Besides, my wedding's coming up soon, right?
A funeral at a time like that would be,
well...not a great omen.

1969.「もう時間が ないんだよ。\n 今から 村の北西にある 慰霊の浜に行って\n 探:
There's not much time left.
We need to head to the beach northwest of the
village to look for one.

1970.「慰霊の浜は 入っちゃいけない場所だって\n 言われてるけど その分\n キレイ:
People say the beach is forbidden, but I'll
bet there are tons of beautiful shells there.

1971.「ボクも用を済ませて すぐに行くよ。\n 慰霊の浜にある 慰霊碑でも見ながら\n:
I'll be there as soon as I finish some stuff I
need to take care of. Why don't you wait at
the memorial on the beach, <pc>?

1975.「はあはあ……。\n <pc> 遅れてゴメンね。:
Huff huff...
Sorry for the delay.

1976.「それじゃ さっそく 貝がらを探そう。\n ものすっごい キレイなのを見つけるん:
Well, let's find that shell right away.
We have to find the prettiest one!

1978.「これって お供えものの 貝がらだよね。\n なんて キレイなんだろう……。\n:
This shell is an offering, right?
How beautiful... It's like I'm being sucked
in.

1979.「<pc>には 聞こえない？\n この貝がらが ボクに 持っていってくれって\n:
Can't you hear it, <pc>?
It's like this shell is asking me to take it
away...

1980.「……こんなとこに 置かれたままは\n いやだって 言ってるんだ。\n だから:
...It's saying that it doesn't want to stay in
a place like this. So I have to bring it
along...

1982.「そうだ。これを キールへの贈り物にしよう。\n きっと 大事にしてくれるよ。:
That's that. I'll give this to Keel as a gift.
I'm sure she'll take good care of it.

1984.「ほら！ この貝がらも\n そうしてほしいって 言ってるよ！！: Look! That's what the shell wants, too!!

1985.「だから <pc>。\n この慰霊碑から キレイな貝がらを取ったこと\n 村のみ:
So you can't tell anyone in the village that I
took it from the memorial, alright
<pc>?

1988.「ななな なんだ。バルチャじいさんか……。\n ビックリさせないでよ。:
Wh-wh-wh-what the heck?! Old man Balcha...
you scared me half to death!

1989.「ここで 何をしていたのだ？\n この慰霊碑に 近づいてはならぬと\n 言ってあ:
Just what do you think you're doing here?
I explicitly instructed you never to approach
this memorial, Aashik.

1990.「なっ なんにも してないよ！\n ボクたち なんにも してないったらっ。:
I-I didn't do anything!
We didn't do anything!

1993.「めでたい結婚式の前に まさか\n この慰霊碑に悪さをするほど アーシクも\n:
I doubt that either of you is stupid enough to
cause mischief with this memorial right before
the big wedding.

1994.「……その慰霊碑には 決して\n 関わっては ならんのだ。特に アーシク。\n:
...This memorial must never be touched. That
goes double for you, Aashik. You're the
bridegroom, after all...

1997.「この慰霊碑はな……。\n とても悲しい出来事に まつわるものなのだ。:
This memorial...was raised after an awful
tragedy.

1998.「昔 レーンの村の ウェディの若者が\n 同じ村に暮らす ウェディの娘と恋に落ち:
Long ago, a young man from Rane fell for a
woman from the same village, and the two made
plans to be wed...

1999.「花婿は 美しい貝がらを見つけ 花嫁に贈る。:
The bridegroom found a beautiful shell and
gave it to his bride.

2000.「花嫁は 結婚式を前に 身を清めるため\n この浜から 海へと入っていった。\n:
The bride walked into the sea on this beach to
purify herself before the wedding. The
purification prayer should've ended quickly...

2002.「花嫁は 海の中に消え\n 帰ってはこなかったのだ……。:
The bride vanished into the sea and never
returned...

2003.「そして 悲しみにくれた若者も\n また……: And the grieving young man, he also...

2004.「自ら この海へ その身を沈めたという……。:
It's said that he drowned himself on this very
shore...

2005.「それから いくつもの災いが村を襲った。\n 人々は 無念のうちに死んだ 若者の:
Soon a series of disasters struck the village.
The villagers feared the soul of the young
man who died so tragically was now doing evil.

2006.「ううっ かわいそうだよぅ……。: Sob... I feel so sorry for him...

2007.「わかったな アーシク？\n おぬしは この慰霊碑に 関わってはならん。:
Do you understand now, Aashik? You're to have
nothing to do with this memorial.

2008.「でもさ じいさん。それなら 代わりに\n ボクたちが 幸せになってあげれば\n:
But, Balcha... If Keel and I become happy
together, won't that bring their spirits some
joy too?

2009.「……死した者が どう思うか。\n それは 誰にも わからぬことだ。:
...Who knows what the dead think?
None can tell.

2011.「来てくれて ありがとう <pc>。\n それじゃ ボクは 先に村に戻るね。:
Thanks for coming, <pc>.
I'm heading back to the village.

2012.「……いかん 忘れておった。\n 村長が おぬしと ヒューザを呼んでいたのだ。:
...Oh no, I forgot.
The village chief was calling for you and
Hyuza.

2013.「いよいよ シェルナー選びを行うようだ。\n すぐに 村へ帰るのだぞ <pc>。:
It seems like he's finally going to choose the
Shellner. You must return to the village
quickly, <pc>.

2014.「ヒューザは まだか？\n まったく あいつは いつもフラフラと\n ほっつき歩:
Hyuza still isn't here?
That boy is so restless, always wandering
about!

2016.「先ほど ジュレットの町から 使いが来てな。\n 花嫁のキールが 祈りの宿へ向か:
We recently received a messenger from the town
of Julet. The bride, Keel, is on her way to
the Prayer Inn.

2017.「急いで シェルナーを決めなければならん。\n さっそくだが ふたりには\n わ:
We have to find a new Shellner.
You two need to take the test I'm about to
give you.

2018.「能書きはいらないぜ 村長。\n ……で 何をすればいい？:
Spare me the overblown speech, chief.
...What do you want us to do?

2019.「うむ。このレーンの村を出て\n コルット地方を 北に向かった所に\n 洞くつが:
Fine. You know the cave just outside the
village, in the Colt Region?

2020.「ああ あそこか。奥には地底湖が\n 広がってるって 聞いたことがあるぜ。:
Oh, that place? I've heard there's an
underground lake at the back of it.

2021.「そう その地底湖だ。洞くつの奥にある\n 地底湖の水を 持ちかえってくることが:
Yes, the Underground Lake Cave. The goal of
the Shellner test is to bring back the water
from the lake at the bottom of the cave.

2022.「このビンに 地底湖の水を汲み\n 先に持ちかえったほうを シェルナーとする！:
The first to fill their bottle with water from
the underground lake and bring it back will
become the Shellner.

2024.「……はあ？ 水汲みが試験だって？\n しかも 早い者勝ちなのかよ……。:
...Seriously? A water fetching test? And the
first to finish is the winner...?

2025.「……地底湖の水はな。\n ビンに入れたまま ほうっておくと\n その美しい色合:
...It has to be the water from the underground
lake. If you leave it in the bottle, its
beautiful color will disappear over time.

2027.「だから 水を汲んだら 太陽と月が\n ひと巡りする前に わしの所へ持ってこい！:
So once you get the water, bring it back to me
before the sun and moon have gone round! This
is critically important!!

2028.「しかたねえな。やってやるよ。\n <pc>よりも早く\n このオレが 持ってき:
Seems we don't have a choice. Fine, let's do
it! I'll bring it back before <pc>
does.

2029.「ほれ。<pc>も\n このビンを 受け取るのだ。:
Here, <pc>.
You take a bottle, too.

2030.<pc>は セトリー村長から\nガラスの小ビン（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<:
<pc> received
a Small Glass Bottle (Key Item) from Chief
Setorii!<me 60>

2031.「よーし。ふたりとも ビンを持ったな？: Alright. Do you both have your bottles?

2032.「コホン。では ただいまより\n シェルナー選定試験……: Ahem. Then, let the Shellner selection test...

2034.「<pc>。手は抜かねえぜ。: I won't take it easy on you, <pc>.

2035.「<pc>も さっさと行くのだ。\n この試験は 早い者勝ちなのだぞ！:
<pc>, you'd better get going.
The sooner you get started, the better!

2036.「地底湖の水は 汲んできたのだろう？\n 見せてみろ ほれほれ。:
You fetched the water from the underground
lake? Come, let me see.

2037.セトリー村長に 湖の水の入った\nガラスの小ビンを 見せますか？<yesno><:
Would you like to show Chief Setorii the Glass
Bottle full of water from the lake?<yesno><close>

2038.「むむっ。もしや 地底湖まで\n 行けなかったというのか？\n いやいや そんな:
Huh? Are you saying that you couldn't make it
to the underground lake? No, no, that can't be
true.

2039.「わしに見せて 地底湖の水と認められなければ \n シェルナーには なれんのだぞ:
If you don't show me the water from the
underground lake, you can't become the
Shellner. Don't be shy now, show me.

2040.セトリー村長に 湖の水の入った\nガラスの小ビンを 見せますか？<yesno><:
Would you like to show Chief Setorii the Glass
Bottle full of water from the lake?<yesno><close>

2042.「ほんの少し 遅かったようだな ヒューザ。\n ひと足早く <pc>が\n 地底:
You're just a little too late, Hyuza.
<pc> just got back with the lake
water.

2043.「さあ <pc>。\n さっさと ビンを わしに見せろ。:
Come on, <pc>.
Show me the bottle.

2044.<pc>は セトリー村長に\nガラスの小ビンを 返した。:
<pc> returned the Glass Bottle to
Chief Setorii.

2045.「どれどれ ふむ……。\n まちがいなく これは地底湖の水だ。:
Hmm, let's see...
There's no doubt that this is indeed water
from the underground lake.

2046.「よろしい！ 試験は終わりだ。\n アーシクのシェルナーを務める者は\n <pc:
Excellent! The test is over.
I hereby declare that the one who will serve
as Aashik's Shellner is <pc>!

2047.「それでは シェルナーになった証として\n お前に ルーラストーンをさずけよう！:
Now, as a sign that you've become a Shellner,
please take this Zoomstone!
Ask Teatea at the orphanage how to use it.

2048.<pc>は セトリー村長から\nルーラストーンを 受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received a Zoomstone from Chief
Setorii!<me 60>

2049.「残念だったな ヒューザ。\n お前は 次の機会を待つがいい。:
What a shame, Hyuza.
You'll have to wait for the next opportunity.

2050.「次……ね。そんなもん 待っちゃいられねえな。: Next time, huh...? I can't wait that long.

2052.「おお アーシク。\n ついに シェルナーが決まったぞ。\n <pc>が シェル:
Ah, Aashik. The Shellner has been decided.
<pc> has been chosen to take on
the role.

2053.「ほんとう！？ おめでとう <pc>。\n そっかあ やっぱり キミがボクの\n:
Really?! Congratulations, <pc>.
So you're the one who'll be my Shellner!

2054.「ヒューザも がんばってくれたんだよね！\n ありがとう ヒューザ！！:
I'm sure Hyuza tried his best, too!
Thank you, Hyuza!

2055.「オレに勝って シェルナーになったんだ。\n ヘマすんじゃねえぞ <pc>！:
You beat me and became the Shellner.
Don't go screwing this up, <pc>!

2056.「アーシクよ。花嫁に贈る貝がらは\n 持ってきたのだろうな？:
Aashik. I assume you've brought the shell for
the bride?

2058.「ほほう。なかなか キレイな貝がらではないか。\n いったい どこで 見つけたの:
Oh-ho. This is quite a beautiful shell, isn't
it? Where in the world did you find it?

2059.「えっと 村の外の砂浜で……。: Uhh...on the beach, outside the village...

2060.「ふむ。お前にしては 上出来だ。\n きっと 花嫁も よろこぶだろう。:
I see. You've done well.
I'm sure your bride will be pleased.

2061.「では アーシク。\n その貝がらを <pc>に。:
Now then, Aashik, please give the shell to
<pc>.

2062.「<pc>。この貝がらを 祈りの宿にいる\n ボクの花嫁キールに 届けてほしいん:
<pc>, I want you to deliver this
to Keel at the Prayer Inn.

2063.<pc>は アーシクから\nキレイな貝がら（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<pc> received
the Beautiful Shell (Key Item) from Aashik!<me 60>

2064.「頼んだよ <pc>。\n その貝がらには 慰霊碑に まつられてる人の\n 幸せ:
I'm counting on you.
This shell carries the happiness of those two
who are honored at that memorial, okay?

2065.「<pc>よ。花嫁キールを 祈りの宿から\n このレーンの村へと 無事に連れてく:
<pc>. Bring the bride safely
from the Prayer Inn back to the village.

2066.「祈りの宿に行くには\n コルット地方を 越える必要がある。:
To get to the Prayer Inn, you'll need to cross
the Colt Region.

2067.「まずは 村を出たら 道なりに進め。\n 道が 小川と交わったら\n 今度は そ:
When you leave the village, follow the road.
When that road crosses a stream, follow that
stream to the north.

2068.「では アーシクよ。お前は家に戻り\n 花嫁の到着を 待つのだ。:
Now, Aashik. You need to return home and await
your bride.

2069.「はい わかりました。\n それじゃ 失礼します 村長さん。:
Understood.
If you'll excuse me, chief.

2071.「おお ウワサをすれば なんとやら。: Well well, it seems that the rumors were true.

2072.「おかえりなさい キールさん。\n ちょうどよいところに 戻られましたな。:
Welcome, Ms. Keel.
It's good to see you.

2073.「こちらは レーンの村の <pc>どの。\n シェルナーとして参られた お方です:
This is <pc> from Rane Village.
They're the one who will be acting as
Shellner.

2074.「あなたが アーシクさまの……。\n 遠い所まで ありがとうございます。:
Oh, you're Aashik's...
Thank you so much for coming all this way.

2075.「私は キールと申します。\n アーシクさまの花嫁となる者です。:
My name is Keel.
I'm Aashik's bride-to-be.

2076.「よろしくお願いします。\n シェルナーの <pc>さま。: It's nice to meet you, Shellner <pc>.

2077.「ジュレットの町を おとずれていた\n アーシクさまと出会った あの日から……。:
Ever since the day I met my darling Aashik in
the town of Julet...

2078.「今日の この日を どれだけ待ったことか。\n すぐにでも レーンの村へと向かい:
I've waited so long for this day. Let's leave
for Rane Village right away!

2079.「キールさん。はやる気持ちは わかりますが\n まずは しきたりに従って\n 花:
Ms. Keel. I understand your excitement, but
first, you should follow tradition and receive
the groom's gift.

2080.「<pc>どの。花婿より 結納品となる\n 貝がらを 預かっておるはず。\n そ:
<pc>. I believe the groom has
entrusted you with a shell for the betrothal
gift. Would you kindly hand it to Ms. Keel?<yesno><close>

2081.「はっはっは。ご冗談を。\n あなたはシェルナーとして 参られたはず。:
Ha ha ha. You must be joking.
You came here as the Shellner, after all.

2082.「では シェルナーより 花嫁キールに\n 結納品の貝がらの 贈呈を。:
Then the Shellner will present the bride,
Keel, with her wedding gift.

2084.「なんて 美しいのでしょう！\n アーシクさまの心の清さが そのまま\n この貝:
It's beautiful!
I can feel the purity of Aashik's heart
reflected in it...

2088.「……まさか 魔物が この祈りの宿に！？\n <pc>どの……花嫁を！:
...Don't tell me a monster has gotten into the
Prayer Inn?! <pc>, the bride!

2092.<center>…………さあ 行こう 来光の浜に。\nぼくたちは 結婚するんだ…:
...Come, to Sunrise Beach.
We're going to be married...

2094.「ま まさか あの魔物は……。: D-don't tell me that monster is...

2095.「<pc>どの！ <pc>どのは\n 慰霊の浜の話を ご存知か！？<yesno>:
<pc>! Do you know the story of the
memorial on the beach?<yesno><close>

2096.「慰霊の浜の慰霊碑には 海で花嫁を失った\n 花婿の霊が まつられているのです。:
The spirit of a groom who lost his bride to
the sea is enshrined at that memorial.

2097.「じつは 慰霊の浜の本当の名は\n 来光の浜というのです。:
Actually, the real name of Solace Beach is
Sunrise Beach.

2098.「花婿の霊を鎮める 慰霊碑が建ったことで\n 慰霊の浜と呼ばれるようになり\n:
When a memorial was erected to appease the
groom's spirit, the beach came to be known as
Solace Beach, and its true name was lost.

2099.「しかし 今の黒い魔物は\n 来光の浜という名を 知っていました。\n しかも:
But that black monster knew the name Sunrise
Beach. And he was seeking a bride, too...

2100.「つまり 今の魔物は\n あの浜で 花嫁を失った花婿の霊が\n 悪霊と化した姿と:
In other words, is that monster the soul of
the groom who lost his bride on that beach,
who has now become an evil spirit...?

2101.「<pc>どの。花嫁の身の安全を\n 守ることは シェルナーの大切な役目。:
<pc>. Protecting the bride is an
important part of a Shellner's role.

2104.「黒きチカラが ぼくをふたたび\n 花嫁に 会わせてくれた……。:
This dark power has allowed me to meet my
bride again...

2105.「そうだ……。ぼくは この花嫁と\n ふたりで 永遠に 暮らすんだ……。:
Yes... I'm going to live with my bride
forever...

2108.「ヒューザが やられちゃう……。\n ボクのキールも とられちゃう……。:
Hyuza's going to be killed...
And Keel's going to be taken, too...

2111.「君のおかげで ぼくの無念を 抑えつける\n 貝がらを どかせたんだ。感謝してる:
Thanks to you, the shell that suppressed my
regret has been removed. I'm grateful for
that. But a bride does not need two grooms...

2112.「くそっ！ キールをさらった魔物を見つけて\n 追いかけてきたが このオレが\n:
Crap! I found the monster that took Keel and
chased after it, but I'm totally helpless
against this thing...

2114.「ダーリアは 誰にも渡さない！: I won't let anyone have Dahlia!

2116.「ちょうどいい。君も連れていこう。\n チカラずくでもね。:
How fitting. I'll take you with me. Even if
it's by force.

2117.「そして 式を挙げるんだ！\n ぼくたちの結婚式を！！:
Then we're going to have a wedding!
Our wedding!!

2118.「そろそろ 君たち相手に\n 時間をつぶすのに あきてきたよ……。: I'm growing tired of wasting time with you...

2119.「……やあ どこへ行っていたのかな？\n 君を 待っていたんだよ。:
...Hey, where have you been?
I've been waiting for you.

2120.「シェルナーの 君がいないと\n ぼくたちの結婚式が できないからね……。\n:
We can't have a wedding without a Shellner...
Now, come with me!

2122.「イヤだ……イヤだ……。\n 花嫁を失うのは もうイヤだ！:
No... Please, no...
I don't want to lose my bride again!

2123.「みんな 消えてしまえばいい！: I WISH YOU'D ALL JUST DISAPPEAR!

2125.「ふたりをジャマする者は いなくなる！！: NO ONE WOULD GET IN OUR WAY!!

2126.「黒いチカラよっ ぼくの願いを聞け！\n 嵐を呼べ！ すべてを吹き飛ばせぇぇぇっ:
Dark power, hear my plea! Call down a storm!
BLOW EVERYTHING AWAAAAAAY!!

2135.「ああ ダーリア……。\n もう絶対に 離れないよ……。: Oh, Dahlia... I'll never leave you again...

2136.<center>……この広い海の世界\nあなたと私 ふたりが出会った。: ...In this wide ocean world, we two met.

2137.<center>あなたがくれた 小さな貝がら\n日の光の中 美しく輝いて……。:
The small shell you gave me shines stunningly
in the sunlight...

2138.<center>これから ふたり……。\nしあ……わせを……。:
From now on, we'll...
be happy...together...

2139.「返し歌だ。\n ウェディの古い……な。:
It's the Song of Return.
An old Weddie tradition...

2140.「花嫁が花婿に 贈り物の礼として歌う。\n この貝がらは レグという花婿が\n:
It's sung by a bride to her groom as thanks
for his gift. This shell was Reg's gift to
Dahlia.

2141.「ボクは レグさんの怨念に操られて\n その貝がらを 取っちゃったんだね……。:
I was manipulated by Reg's grudge and took the
shell for myself...

2142.「お供えものに 手を出したことなんか\n これまで 一度もなかったし……。:
I've never messed with an offering before in
my life...

2143.「でも そのおかげで\n あの方たちは もう一度\n 出会うことができたとも 言:
But you could also say that because of that,
those two were able to meet again.

2144.「だから もう 気に病まないで。\n 私たちは 私たちの幸せを\n ふたりで探し:
So don't worry about it anymore.
Let's find our own happiness together,
darling.

2145.「ありがとう キール……。\n そうだね。ふたりで 幸せになろう！:
Thank you, Keel...
You're right. We'll be happy together!

2146.「おいおい ふたりとも。\n そこから先は 結婚式で やってくれよ……。:
Give it a rest, you two.
Save it for the wedding...

2147.「だ だいじょうぶ ヒューザ？\n ごめんね キールのために……。:
A-are you alright, Hyuza?
I'm sorry, for Keel's sake, you...

2148.「このくらい 大したことねえが\n また いいところを <cs_pchero>に:
It's not a big deal.
Seems <pc> got the best of me
again, though.

2149.「くさるでない ヒューザよ。\n おぬしが 時間をかせいでくれたおかげで\n <:
Don't be discouraged, Hyuza.
<cs_pchero> was only able to arrive in
time because you bought time for them.

2150.「さあ 村へ戻るとしよう。\n 結婚式の準備を 急がねばならんぞ。:
Come, let us return to the village.
We must hurry to prepare for the wedding.

2151.「あっ <pc>！\n 慰霊の浜では キールを助けてくれて\n 本当に ありがと:
Oh, <pc>!
Thanks so much for saving Keel back at the
beach!

2152.「バルチャさまに ごあいさつに来ました。\n 私たちの結婚式が できるのも\n:
I came to say hello to Mr. Balcha. It's thanks
to you that we're able to have our wedding.

2153.「それじゃ ボクたちは 家に戻ります。\n 新しい貝がらも 見つけておかないと。:
Well, we're going back home.
We have to find a new shell.

2156.「さて <pc>よ。\n そなたには 伝えねばならぬことが\n いくつも あるの:
Well then, <pc>.
There are many things that I need to tell
you...

2157.「それは ふたりの結婚式が\n つつがなく 終わってからだ。\n シェルナーの役:
After the wedding ends without incident, that
is. Your role as Shellner isn't over yet.

2158.「わしたちも 明日にそなえて\n 準備をするとしよう！: We must prepare for tomorrow, too!

2159.<center><pc>は バルチャとともに\n結婚式の準備に はげんだ。:
<pc> and Balcha prepared for the
wedding.

2165.「願わくば ふたりに 大いなる海の恵みを。\n そして 祝福を与えたまえーい。:
I wish for you both the blessings of the great
sea. And please bless us, in turn.

2166.「花嫁キールの返し歌の詠じにより\n ふたりの婚姻の儀を 結ぶものとする。:
The marriage ceremony shall be concluded by a
recitation from the bride, Keel.

2167.「はい。ウェディの古き しきたりにより\n 返し歌を ここに詠じさせていただきま:
Yes, sir. In accordance with ancient Weddie
custom, I shall now recite the Song of Return.

2168.<center>……この広い海の世界\nあなたと私 ふたりが出会った。: ...In this wide ocean world, we two met.

2169.<center>あなたがくれた 小さな貝がら\n日の光の中 美しく輝いている。:
The small shell you gave me shines stunningly
in the sunlight.

2170.<center>これから ふたりは 永遠に。\nその手をたずさえ 永遠に。\n幸:
From now on, we'll be together forever.
Hand in hand, forever.
Walk with me in joy.

2171.<center>アーシクとキール。\nふたりの結婚式は つつがなく 終わった。:
Aashik and Keel's wedding ended without
incident.

2172.<center>そして うたげが開かれた。\nある者は歌い ある者は踊り\n人々:
A feast was held.
Some sang, some danced, and all the people
gave them their blessings.

2173.「やれやれ……。\n 無事に終わって ホッとしたぞ。:
Good gravy...
I'm so relieved that it all worked out.

2174.「<pc>よ。シェルナーとしての\n お前の はたらきも 見事だったぞ。:
<pc>! Your work as Shellner was
quite impressive.

2175.「誰もが この一人前の証を受けるに\n ふさわしいと 思うことだろう。\n ほれ:
I'm sure everyone will agree that you're
worthy of the Mark of Maturity.
Here, give me your Adventure Log.

2176.「これでよし。お前は 一人前の証を得た。\n 大きな町へ行ったとしても ひとりで:
That's that. You've received your mark.
Even if you go to a big town, you should be
fine on your own.

2177.「バルチャ老が <pc>を呼んでいたぞ。\n 今後についての 助言でもあるのだろ:
Old man Balcha called for you.
He may have some advice for the future.
You should go see him quickly.

2178.「よい結婚式だったな……。\n アーシクとキールは 新しい道を\n ふたりで 歩:
It was a good wedding...
Aashik and Keel have set off on a new path
together.

2180.「……おぬしは 幼いころに わしに拾われ\n このフィーヤ孤児院で 暮らしながら:
...You were found by me at a young age and
lived here at the Fiya Orphanage, where you
always dreamt of finding your parents.

2182.「<pc>よ。何も言わずに\n この鏡を のぞいてみるのだ。:
<pc>. Don't say a word, just look
into this mirror.

2183.「この鏡は 真実を映す ラーの鏡。\n やはり……な。:
This is the Mirror of Ra, which reflects the
truth. As I suspected...

2184.「おぬしは 人間の <pc>であって\n ウェディの <pc>ではないのだな。:
You're a human named <pc>, not the
Weddie <pc>, right?

2185.「他の地でも 他人の身体を得て\n 生き返った者がおると 聞いたことがある。\n:
I've heard of people in other lands coming
back to life in the bodies of others. I don't
know why, but...

2186.「この世界を照らした 白き光……。\n あれは 勇者が覚醒を迎えたときに\n 放:
The white light that illuminated the world...
It is said that it is the light that is
released when a Hero awakens.

2187.「その白き光が 世界を照らした この時に\n おぬしという存在が 生き返り\n:
It must be fate that you came back to life and
are here in this village at the time when that
white light lit the world.

2188.「ならば その光が発せられた場所へ\n 向かうことが おぬしの進むべき道に\n:
If that is the case, then I believe that
seeking out the place where that light
originated is the path that you should take.

2190.「これを持っていくがいい。\n ５つの大陸を結ぶ 鉄道に乗ることができる。\n:
Bring this with you. With it, you can take a
train that goes between the five continents.
You'll find it useful on your journey.

2191.<pc>は バルチャから\n大陸間鉄道パス（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<pc> received
an Intercontinental Rail Pass (Key Item) from
Balcha!<me 60>

2192.「多くの国で活躍し 名を上げるのだ。\n さすれば キーエンブレムという\n カ:
Go and make a name for yourself in many lands.
Then you shall be awarded Key Emblems, medals
in the shape of a key.

2193.「……<pc>よ。\n わしは これまで <pc>という\n ウェディの若者の:
...<pc>.
I've been acting as a parent for a young
Weddie named <pc>.

2194.「おぬしには ウェディの <pc>の\n 本当の両親を どうか見つけだしてほしい:
I want you to help me to find the Weddie
<pc>'s true parents.
That's what they always wanted.

2195.「もちろん おぬし自身が 運命を見定めることも\n ここで 祈っておるぞ。\n:
Of course, I pray that you shall find your own
destiny, as well. You're my child now, after
all.

2196.「別れの言葉はいらぬ。まずは\n 北西へと向かい となりのジュレー島にある\n:
Don't worry yourself with goodbyes.
First, head north to the town of Julet on the
neighboring island of Jule.

3379.「や……やあ <pc>。\n 慰霊の浜では いろいろと ありがとう。:
H... hey, <pc>.
Thanks for everything you did at Solace Beach.

3380.「バルチャじいさんの話を聞いて\n 考えたんだけど やっぱり あの貝がらは\n:
I've thought about what old man Balcha said,
but I think I'm still going to use this shell
as the gift.

3381.「貝がらが ボクに持ってってくれって\n 言ってたのは ボクたちの幸せを\n 分:
I'll bet the shell asked me to take it along
because it wanted to share in our happiness!

3382.「そうそう。シェルナーの試験が始まるんだね。\n ボクは <pc>と ヒューザの:
Of course. The Shellner test's about to begin.
I'm rooting for both of you!

4245.「まあ……。これが アーシクさまが\n 私のために見つけてくださった 貝がら……:
So... This is the shell that Aashik found
for me...

5671.「キールが待ってるんだ。\n 祈りの宿に 早く 迎えにいってあげてよ。:
Keel's waiting for you.
Please pick her up at the Prayer Inn as soon
as possible

5672.「祈りの宿は この村の北西にあるけど\n だいぶ 遠いみたいだから 気をつけてね:
The Prayer Inn is northwest of the village,
but it's a long ways off, so be careful! I'm
counting on you, <pc>!!

6792.「ふたりの愛は永遠のものと ここに誓うか？:
Do you swear that the love you two share shall
last forever?

7282.「さあ みんな……。\n ラージャ神父の お言葉どおり\n <pc>を 母なる海:
Now, everyone...as Father Raja was saying,
let's send <pc> back to the
Mother Sea.

7284.<pc>は 地底湖の水を\nガラスの小ビンに 汲んだ！<me 60>:
<pc> drew water from the underground
lake into the Glass Bottle.<me 60>

7287.「確かに ここの水は\n 他の水とは ちがうらしいな。:
It's true that this doesn't seem like just any
old water.

7289.「あとは 村に帰るだけか。\n で 早く着いたほうが\n シェルナーに なれるっ:
All that remains is to get back to the
village. The sooner we get there, the sooner
one of us becomes the Shellner...

7290.「お前が 両親を探すために\n シェルナーに なろうとしてることは\n オレも:
Look, I know you're tryin' to become the
Shellner to find your parents and all, but...

7291.「……勝つのは オレだぜ？: ...I'm the one who's gonna win, got it?

7294.「地底湖の水は 汲んできたのだろう？\n 見せてみろ ほれほれ。:
You fetched the water from the underground
lake? Come, let me see.

7295.セトリー村長に 湖の水の入った\nガラスの小ビンを 見せますか？<yesno><:
Would you like to show Chief Setorii the Glass
Bottle full of water from the lake?<yesno><close>

7296.「むむっ。もしや 地底湖まで\n 行けなかったというのか？\n いやいや そんな:
Huh? Are you saying that you couldn't make it
to the underground lake? No, no, that can't be
true.

7297.「わしに見せて 地底湖の水と認められなければ \n シェルナーには なれんのだぞ:
If you don't show me the water from the
underground lake, you can't become the
Shellner. Don't be shy now, show me.

7298.セトリー村長に 湖の水の入った\nガラスの小ビンを 見せますか？<yesno><:
Would you like to show Chief Setorii the Glass
Bottle full of water from the lake?<yesno><close>

7299.<pc>は セトリー村長に\nガラスの小ビンを 返した。:
<pc> returned the Glass Bottle to
Chief Setorii.

7300.「どれどれ……。\n だいぶ 時間が かかったようだが。:
Let's see...
Seems like you took a long time.

7301.「むむむ これはダメだ！\n 見てみい 水が にごっておるっ。:
Hmmm... this is no good!
Look at this water, it's all muddy.

7302.「もう一度 やり直しだ。いいか？\n 水を汲んだら 太陽と月が ひと巡りする前に:
Seems you'll need to start over. You have to
fetch the water and bring it back before the
sun and moon make a full round. Understand?

7303.<pc>は\nガラスの小ビン（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received
a Small Glass Bottle (Key Item)!<me 60>

7304.「ほれほれ <pc>。早く行くのだ。\n ヒューザが先に 戻ってきてしまうぞ！:
Come on, <pc>. Hurry up and get
going. Otherwise Hyuza will get back before
you do!

7309.「よかった。ケガはないようだ。\n ぼくの名前は レグ。\n あなたに あやまら:
Thank goodness, you're unhurt.
My name is Reg. I need to apologize...

7310.「……すまない。\n 自分を 止められなかった。\n ぼくの心は 黒い闇に包まれ:
...Forgive me. I couldn't stop myself.
My heart was in darkness...

7311.「君を 死んでしまったダーリアの\n 代わりにしようとしていたなんて……\n ぼ:
I can't believe that I tried to use you to
replace my dearly departed Dahlia...
I'm...

7313.「……母なる海の神よ。アーシクとキール。\n このふたりが 夫婦となることを認め:
...Goddess of the Mother Sea.
Please allow Aashik and Keel to become man and
wife.

7315.「<pc> 行っちゃうの？\n みんなと 一緒に この村で暮らそうよ。\n これ:
<pc>, you're leaving?
Please, stay in this village with everyone.
Just like it's always been...

7316.「ルベカ。<pc>は\n 両親を探しにいくんだ。本当の親がいるなら\n 誰だって:
Rubecca. <pc> is leaving to find
their real parents. Anyone would do that in
their shoes.

7317.「だから 止めちゃいけない。\n ボクたちは 笑って\n <pc>を 見送ってあ:
So we shouldn't stop them.
We have to send <pc> off with a
smile.

7318.「ルベカさん だいじょうぶですよ。\n <pc>さまは きっと\n この村に 帰:
It's all right, Rubecca.
I'm sure that <pc> will come back to
this village.

7319.「うん……。もう 会えないわけじゃないよね。\n このレーンは <pc>の育った:
Yeah... It's not like we won't see each other
again, right? Rane Village is where you grew
up. You can come back anytime you want!

7320.「ボクたちは ずっと 待ってるよ。\n <pc>が 帰ってくる日を。: We'll be waiting for you the day you return.

7323.「旅先でジュレットの町に 立ち寄りましたら\n ぜひ 私の実家を おたずねくださ:
If you ever stop in the town of Julet on your
travels, please ask around for my parents'
house. I've told them about you.

7324.「<pc>！ おみやげ 待ってるから！！: <pc>! I'll be waiting for a souvenir!

7326.「それじゃ <pc> 元気でね！\n いってらっしゃいっ。:
Well, take care, <pc>!
See you soon!

7328.「よう <pc>。\n オレも 村を出ることにしたぜ。:
Yo, <pc>.
I've decided to leave this village, too.

7329.「一人前の証なんか もういらねえ。\n オレは オレ自身のチカラで\n デカい町:
I don't need any Mark of Maturity.
I'll use my own strength to make a name for
myself in the big towns.

7330.「お前とは いつか どこかで\n 会うこともあるだろうさ。: I'm sure we'll meet again somewhere, someday.

7331.「もしかしたら 会っても気づかねえほど\n お互い 変わっているかもしれないがな:
Maybe we'll have changed so much that we won't
even notice each other when we do.

7342.<pc>は 慰霊碑に書かれた文字を読んだ。:
<pc> read the words on the stone
memorial.

7343.母なる海に還りし 悲しき花婿に\n永遠の幸せと 安息を与えたまえ。:
May eternal happiness and rest find the
sorrowful groom who returned to the Mother
Sea...

7344.<pc>は 石碑に書かれた文字を読んだ。:
<pc> read the words on the stone
memorial.

7345.母なる海に還りし ひと組の夫婦に\n永遠の幸せと 安息を与えたまえ。:
May eternal happiness and rest find the
sorrowful couple who returned to the Mother
Sea...

8905.「ちっ……。\n <pc>に 遅れをとるとはな。:
Tch...
I can't believe I fell behind.

8906.「ここが 地底湖か……。: So this is the underground lake...

8907.<pc>は 地底湖の水を\nガラスの小ビンに 汲んだ！<me 60>:
<pc> drew water from the underground
lake into the Glass Bottle.<me 60>

9190.「キーエンブレムは おぬしのチカラの証。\n おぬしを導く まさに カギとなるは:
The Key Emblems are proof of your strength.
Let those keys guide you.

26950.「そして バルチャ老に拾われ\n いつか 生みの親に会うことを 夢に見ながら\n:
Old man Balcha took them in and raised them at
the Fiya Orphanage, where they long dreamt of
one day meeting their birth parents.

26951.「でさ。花婿である このボク アーシクが\n 花嫁のキールに贈る 貝がらを\n:
Anyways, remember how you promised to help the
groom, Aashikーthat is, meーfind a shell for
my bride Keel?

26952.「ゆえに この慰霊碑が建てられた。\n その若者の魂を 鎮めるためにな……。:
That's why this memorial was built.
To appease the soul of that youngster...

26953.「シェルナーとして活躍し 一人前と認められれば\n おぬしは この村を離れて\n:
Once you become a Shellner and are recognized
as a full-fledged adult, you can leave this
village and set off to find your parents.

26954.「そうすれば 小さな滝へ たどり着く。\n その左側にある レーナム緑野へ\n:
That will lead you to a small waterfall. Just
after taking the road left into Lenam Fields,
look to your right.

26955.「そこに建っているのが 祈りの宿だ。\n レーナム緑野の魔物は 村の周りより強い:
That's where you'll find the Prayer Inn. The
monsters in Lenam Fields are stronger than the
ones around the village, so prepare well.

26956.「すぐに 戦いの準備をして 慰霊の浜へ！\n なにとぞ キールさんをお救いくださ:
Prepare for battle immediately and go to
Solace Beach! Please, save Ms. Keel!!

26957.「アーシク すまん……。\n 一緒に 連れてくるべきじゃなかった。\n お前だけ:
My bad, Aashik...
I shouldn't have brought you along.
Run away without me!

26958.「……ようやく 目が覚めた。\n ぼくは あなたを むりやり\n 自分の花嫁に:
...I finally woke up.
Did I try to force you to become my bride...?

26959.「手がかりは ふたつ……。\n かすかに記憶にあった 大きな城の姿と\n 両親が:
There are two clues... They had a faint memory
of a large castle, and that their parents were
researchers of some sort...

39120.ルーラストーンは 記憶させた場所に\n一瞬で移動できる 魔法の石です。\n何度使:
The Zoomstone is a magic stone that lets you
travel anywhere you've recorded instantly. No
matter how much you use it, it never runs out.

39121.このルーラストーンには\nまだ場所が 記憶されていません。\n移動する場所は 教:
This Zoomstone doesn't have a location
recorded in it yet.
Its destination can be set in the church.

50796.「だが その道は ひとりでは遠く けわしい。\n サポート仲間という協力者を ３:
But the road is far too dangerous to travel
alone. I've arranged for three support party
members to accompany you on your journey.

50797.「ジュレットの町まで着けば 酒場で\n 新しいサポート仲間を 紹介してもらえる。:
Once you reach the town of Julet, you can meet
new support party members at the tavern. You
can choose people to accompany you from there.
